name: Deliverance (itch) (sreeraj)
description:
Deliverance is a story based Action Game. The game shows the threat we are facing now in the real world.

Game created for Gamejam.

Game developed  in 4 days.

Developer of the Game - Sreeraj.p.p

Tools used to build this game

unity3D, AdobeFuse, Mixamo(Character Animation), unity particlespack,  paint3D, Photoshop, Tree10 pack.

Play and Support
